misuses.description: The SecureRandom API is vulnerable to a broken crypto algorithm, which can be exploited by an attacker to predict the next random number generated.
misuses.recommendation: Use a secure random number generation algorithm, such as SecureRandom.getInstanceStrong(), to generate random numbers.

misuses.description: The SecureRandom API is vulnerable to a weak random number generation, which can be exploited by an attacker to predict the next random number generated.
misuses.recommendation: Use a secure random number generation algorithm, such as SecureRandom.getInstanceStrong(), to generate random numbers.

misuses.description: The SecureRandom API is vulnerable to a lack of entropy, which can be exploited by an attacker to predict the next random number generated.
misuses.recommendation: Use a secure random number generation algorithm, such as SecureRandom.getInstanceStrong(), to generate random numbers.
